name: the concept of adaptation
description:
this shot was inspired by bruce lee speech :

" Be Water, My Friend.
Empty your mind.
Be formless, shapeless, like water.
You put water into a cup, it becomes the cup.
You put water into a bottle, it becomes the bottle.
You put it into a teapot, it becomes the teapot.
Now water can flow or it can crash.
Be water, my friend. "

find out my latest work at my Instagram @albertuspamungkas

you can also request my art for my new NFT art
